docs.text: Welcome to My Notes ¶ In this repository I write my notes about different technologies.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: In this repository I write my notes about different technologies.
docs.title: Welcome to My Notes

docs.text: Multi-Accounts ¶ Sometimes it may be necessary to set up different git accounts for different directories. In my computer I use the following configuration: ~/.ssh/config.d/git Host github.com HostName github.com User git IdentityFile ~/.ssh/keys/github Host ssh.dev.azure.com HostName ssh.dev.azure.com User git IdentityFile ~/.ssh/keys/azdevops ~/.gitconfig [user] name = fullname-fake email = username-fake@company-fake.com [includeIf "gitdir:~/repos/personal/"] path = ~/repos/personal/.gitconfig ~/repo/personal/.gitconfig [user] name = personal-username-fake email = personal-email-fake
docs.title: Multi-accounts

docs.text: Sometimes it may be necessary to set up different git accounts for different directories. In my computer I use the following configuration: ~/.ssh/config.d/git Host github.com HostName github.com User git IdentityFile ~/.ssh/keys/github Host ssh.dev.azure.com HostName ssh.dev.azure.com User git IdentityFile ~/.ssh/keys/azdevops ~/.gitconfig [user] name = fullname-fake email = username-fake@company-fake.com [includeIf "gitdir:~/repos/personal/"] path = ~/repos/personal/.gitconfig ~/repo/personal/.gitconfig [user] name = personal-username-fake email = personal-email-fake
